channel.title: Music – Oscar Dunbar
channel.description: Recent content in Oscar Dunbar on Music

item.title: Oscar Dunbar - Spring Rain ("One Spring Night"OST)
item.description:
작곡: Rachael Yamagata, Kevi.. / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 91352

Look
of life
The birds are out
again
I can feel a change
upon the wind
The color
of the sky
And the sound
of the rain
Coming down
down down
I can tell that
you’re the same as me
Wanting to feel
curious and free
Life had
locked me in
But you opened up
the door
You opened up
the door
Seasons
they change
Gone away
then back again
Every sign
I see is you
I am tired of hiding
how I feel
Every sign is
telling me it’s real

Looking back
it’s easy now to see
Something inside
longing to be free
The story
in your eyes
And the stars
in the sky
Turning round
round round
Look
at love
And how she makes
her plan
Urging us on
offering her hand
Bringing you to me
always meant to be
Now
I understand that
Seasons
they change
Gone away
then back again
Every sign
I see is you
I am tired of hiding
how I feel
Every sign is
telling me it’s real
Every sign is
telling me it’s real

Seasons
change
Gone away
then back again
Every sign
I see is you
I am tired of hiding
how I feel
Every sign is
telling me it’s real
Seasons
change
Gone away
then back again
Every sign
I see is you
I am tired of hiding
how I feel
Every sign is
telling me it’s real
